```r
#centered with linear and quadratic term
hcc <-
  hcc %>% 
  mutate(
    INR_cent = scale(income_needs, scale = FALSE)
  )
hc_inr2 <- lmer(
  hc_trimlog ~ 
    poly(seg_week, 2) * sum_sev_child_cent +
    poly(seg_week, 2) * income_needs + 
    weeks_preg_cent + 
    (seg_week|ID), 
  data = hcc
)
summary(hc_inr2)
```
